title: Attaching email messages to new outgoing email messages.
content:
I need to send emails from my Thunderbird email client to recipients but in that email also attach other emails messages that I have received that may or may not have arrived into the same email account inbox folder as the one from which I am sending.

Another way of asking the same question is that I want to attach email messages or copy and paste them, from one location into my outgoing email message? Is this possible in Thunderbird?

In Outlook, I can simply copy the relevant email that I want to send on and then paste that into the outgoing email message; is the same possible in Thunderbird? I am using 115.7.0 (64-bit)
creator: davidmccorquodale

title: cannot send emails. I get outgoing error 20
creator: walterjuneau740

title: Not all emails are showing in inbox
content:
Hi, I installed the latest Thunderbird on OS X Monterey for a friend and am using an Imap email account. Sending and receiving emails is working correctly. The problem is viewing what is in the inbox, it shows a certain number in the inbox but not all of those messages are showing up, some are missing. I've played around with the settings but I didn't see anythng that could help me out. On my own computer this works correctly, when I see a number in the inbox, it does show all of those email messages. Not sure what is going on, maybe it's simple like a setting not done correctly, or I missed something. Anyway, any help would be appreciated.

Thanks
creator: t51

title: Cannot connect to Spectrum outgoing server
content: Suddenly, I cannot send mail via Thunderbird. Settings are defaults, security is set to minimum, and I'm getting timed out errors from the outgoing server. Same issue with two different Macs (Mini and MB Air), both running Mac OS Sonoma. Changing ports has no effect. Can send mail from the same Spectrum account via my iPhone, and Spectrum's webmail works fine, so the problem seems to be a new incompatibility of Spectrum with either Thunderbird or Mac OS.
creator: jpdemers1
